About StahlFerro

Hello! I am StahlFerro - I am both a youtube VFX Composite-Animations content creator and a software developer

> VFX Composite-Animations
Ranging from the crudely-made Montage Parody-style videos, to cinematic animation and VFX composites, I create a very wide range of unique entertainment videos that can be considered it's own category. I play around with a lot of VFX and composition of static images, both combined to produce a hybrid form of animation that displays an intense visual graphic experience. Most of my main works are uploaded as videos on youtube, but I also make short GIFs and animations posted on my Imgur account

> Software Developer
I'm the sole developer of the Discord moderation bot FortressBot, a bot made with auto-moderative features. Aside from FortressBot, I also develop StatusBot, a little discord bot to notify me if some bots I monitor goes offline. I'm working on projects and tools that help me with my works, and I host them on Github so other people can find use of it

Although videos require weeks to months to work on, and infrequent youtube uploads make me appear very inactive, I am most active on my Discord server, where I centralize both FortressBot's development and my youtube community inside it. I monitor the server everyday regardless of its current activity.
Come have a visit!

Further support and donations are always appreciated <3
